column4: does anyone know what driver to use for a realtek 8185?  I tried using ndiswrapper with drivers that i downloaded from my laptop manufacturer but i couldn't find .inf files only .exe
the .inf is inside the .exe file some are just zip files
so i should download the exe file?  Then what should i do to get the inf?
unzip <name>.exe if it's just an zip archieve some aren't though
